Key: Later, Itsuka. Don't get too crazy tonight.

What are you talking about? Go home already!
Later, Tonomachi.
Yeah. Later.
Jeez, that Tonomachi...
Shido-san. Do you have a moment?
Oh, Kurumi. Wait... Where's your uniform?
I changed. I need to head out right away.

I-I see... It must be important if you're changing
for the occasion.
Yes. It's very important.

Ah, Tokisaki-san! You look just as radiant in your
casual wear as you do in your uniform...
Hey, Tonomachi! I thought you went home?

I saw Tokisaki-san, so I had to come back. How
often do I get to see her in her normal clothes?
If I missed out, I'd regret it forever.
You're such an idiot.

Whatever! Why do you get to see her in her normal
clothes, but I can't?
...You.
Yes, what is it, Tokisaki-san?
Weren't you... Tonosama-san?
Uh... no. Um. I'm Tonomachi...

I'm sorry, but would you mind going away? I'm
speaking with Shido-san at the moment.

What... Tokisaki-san... You're so cold. Can't I
hang out for just a minute?

I think that minute is up. You'd best hurry or...
hehe. We're going to see red flowers bloom in the
streets.
A-Ahhhh! G-Good-bye!
You're the usual level of harsh today.

Oh, you think so? I was just being honest
with him.
I-I see. Well I won't ask too many questions.
Right... Then let's go, Shido-san.
Huh? Oh, okay...

Um, Kurumi, I thought you were going somewhere.
I mean, you even got dressed up.

Yes. Like I said, we're on our way. To your house,
Shido-san.
...What?
I'm going to spend time with you at your house.
What?!
Oh? Is that not allowed?
Well... you can, but...
Hehe... Then it'll be as usual...

(I thought she was going downtown because she got
all dressed up, but...)
(I see. She's coming over to my place...)
I'm home...
I'm coming in.

Okay... So we're here, but... what did you mean by
as usual"?"
Shido-saaaaaan～
K-Kurumi?!
Awww. I was so sad that you didn't hold me today.

B-But that's no reason to just tackle me! And
this... Is this what's as usual"?!"
I-It's because you won't hold me at school.

Well, obviously people at school couldn't see
this... I mean, God knows what they'd say...
And that's why I try to be a good girl at school.

Good girl...? You're not just good, you're super
cool. You're ice cold. Especially towards
Tonomachi.

At school I don't get enough of Shido-san, so I
get irritated. Please hurry, Shido-san... or else,
I'll be sad. I think I'm going to cry.

Who would imagine... the cool and distant Kurumi
from school is actually this affectionate... No
one in class would ever believe it.
Hmm, mmmm... Shido-saaaan. Please hold me more.

Um... Why don't we actually separate for now... I
mean, it's so hard to move.

It's fiiiiine. Let's just continue talking
like this.

Talking, huh... I mean, I guess, but... What are
we going to talk about?

Shido-san, you decide. Anything is fun when it's
with you.

What? I have to decide? Well I guess, but if we
talk a bit, will you get off me?
So, what should we talk about?
Studying.
Food.
Perverted things.

It's almost time for our exams. Have you been
studying?

Oh, not really. But if you pay attention in class,
the tests aren't too hard.
Hmm. I guess you're a different type than I am.

But I'm not too good with numbers, so please study
with me next time.

You're really not good with numbers? You'd better
not be looking for more excuses to hold onto me...
No, I'm serious.
Then you want to start studying now?
Absolutely not. Now it's time to be held.
(...I knew it. She has no intentions of studying.)
What kind of food do you like, Kurumi?
So long as you'll feed me, I'll eat anything.

I see. But it's hard to know what to make if you
just say anything.
Heh. Shido-san. Ahhhh. Feed me.
Is that what you meant?
Huh? What other meanings could it have?
Oh, I just took it as me making food for you.

Oh. You mean like feeding me through your mouth?
Hehe... Of course I wouldn't mind that.
Wait, wait, wait.

Hehe. Shido-san. You're totally blushing right
now. How adorable. I may just eat you up,
Shido-san. Just kidding... Hehehehehehehehe...
*Grunt*...

(I guess talking about food with Kurumi isn't a
good idea. What is this feeling... I sense that
my life is in danger... I wonder why?)
Kurumi. What kind of underwear do you have on?
My, is that what you really want to know?

...Okay, so you're really fine with any topic,
huh... I meant it as a joke.
Oh, so you don't want to know, then?

W-Well, um. I guess it would be all right to hear
for reference...
Hehe... Is that so? Then...
*Gulp*...
I won't tell you.
I figured!
Hehe... Shido-san, you pervert.

Ha...haha. I was kidding. But... that's still kind
of messed up.
Anyways, I kind of have to get dinner ready...
What?! No! I haven't had enough yet!

But at this rate, I won't be able to get
anything done.
Still, I don't want such an abhorrent thing.
Kurumi, it's time for you to go home, right?
...I want to be with you all day.
Come on, don't be like that.
I don't want to leave you... Don't you understand?

Yeah, but you still have to go home eventually,
you know?
...I can spend the night tonight.

Wait. Don't tell me you were planning to do
that from the beginning, and that's why you
changed your clothes?
I don't know about that.

Well, there are open rooms here, so I guess I
don't mind... Anyways, I have to get ready for
dinner.
Aww. Noooo.
H-Hey, let go of me.

Let's get food delivered. That way you can hold me
the whole time.
Y-You'd go to that extent?
Yes. I want to be with you allllllll the time.
Hm. I guess we can't help it, then...
Hehehe... Shido-saaaan.

But there's nothing to do if we just stay like
this. What do we do next? You still want to
talk about something?
Pet me...
What...?
I want you to pet my head, Shido-san.
Pet you...?
Yes.
L-Like this...?
Mmmmmmm...
...Like this?
Yeess. It feels good. I want you to keep doing it.
...Here I go.
Ahh... I feel so happy...
Haha, you're so affectionate.
Hehe... I know. Your Kurumi is very affectionate.
Well... I guess it's not bad?
Hehe... Shido-san?
What is it, Kurumi?
Hehe... I love you so much.

*Groan*... I wonder why... My heart feels a bit
strange... Something about this just doesn't seem
right...
Not at all. Shido-san, you'll be with me forever.

O-Okay... Yeah... That's right. You've always been
like this, huh Kurumi? And from now on, too...

Yes, we'll be together forever. Let's eat dinner
like this.
Right. I guess I'll have to order delivery.
Hehe... You'll hold me the whole time, won't you?
Jeez... I guess.
